Item ID26801

A catalytic tiara is a head slot item used in Runecraft. It is created at any catalytic runic altar by using a gold tiara or catalytic talisman on the altar with both in your inventory. This consumes the catalytic talisman and yields 60 Runecraft experience.

While a catalytic tiara is equipped, the mysterious ruins to catalytic altars have a left-click "Enter" option, freeing up an inventory slot that the catalytic talisman would otherwise occupy.

Limitations[edit | edit source]

Certain catalytic runes may only be crafted after meeting certain quest requirements:[1]

Rune Requirement
Blood rune May be crafted at the true Blood Altar beneath Morytania after Sins of the Father
Death rune May be crafted after completion of Mourning's End Part II
Law rune May be crafted after Troll Stronghold
Wrath rune May be crafted after Dragon Slayer II

[[File:Catalytic tiara detail.png|left|130px]]
[[File:Catalytic tiara chathead.png|left]]
A '''catalytic tiara''' is a [[head slot]] item used in [[Runecraft]]. It is created at any [[runic altar#catalytic|catalytic runic altar]] by using a [[gold tiara]] or [[catalytic talisman]] on the altar with both in your inventory. This consumes the catalytic talisman and yields 60 Runecraft [[experience]].

While a catalytic tiara is equipped, the [[mysterious ruins]] to catalytic altars have a left-click "''Enter''" option, freeing up an inventory slot that the catalytic talisman would otherwise occupy.
